â€œIt means early love, cute isn't it? Well, I noticed it when I'm with you, when we took one of those silly quizzes and thenn?

Yours results were lilacs. 

And mine's were iris. 

â€lilacs the purple flowers " Suddenly when I see purple, all I remember is you.. Stupid, isn't it? 

Suddenly lilacs is my favorite flowers, suddenly I loved the color purple, and then.. I love you. 

Oh! And did you know that iris symbolizes hope? Or faith? iris always had faith for lilacs, and still do, always do. 

Crazy, right? â€

-signed out, shighosted drafts poems.
